call_title: Opening Doors with Ergo | PandaV | Ergoversary 2025

topics.title: PandaVee Blockchain Access Control System Introduction
topics.summary: Introduction of PandaVee, a blockchain-based access control system built on Ergo that uses unique token IDs for user verification instead of traditional cards or passwords. All access events are recorded immutably on the blockchain for transparency and security.

topics.title: Arduino Hardware Setup and Integration Process
topics.summary: Technical demonstration of setting up the PandaVee system including starting the Ergonode server, deploying the Android app, and configuring the Arduino-based hardware module. The presentation shows the integration of Arduino and Wiegand versions.

topics.title: Live ErgoPay Authentication and Door Unlock Demo
topics.summary: Live demonstration of the complete access process using ErgoPay signing, NFT token selection, QR code generation and scanning, server validation, and blockchain transaction recording. Shows real-time door unlocking with on-chain verification through Ergo Explorer.

topics.title: Future Development Plans and Ergoversary Thanks
topics.summary: Outline of upcoming enhancements including database integration, improved mobile app functionality, and additional hardware integration. Concludes with appreciation for Ergo community support and Ergoversary celebration.
